mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_book (bookname, bookprice, bookauthor, booknum, typeid, pubid, bookpic) VALUES (#{bookname},#{bookprice},#{bookauthor},#{booknum},#{typeid},#{pubid},'' )
mapper.select: SELECT t_book.*,t_booktype.id as 'booktype.id', t_publisher.id as 'publisher.id', t_booktype.booktype as 'booktype.booktype', t_publisher.pubname as 'publisher.pubname' FROM t_book INNER JOIN t_booktype on t_book.typeid = t_booktype.id INNER JOIN t_publisher on t_book.pubid = t_publisher.id ORDER BY t_book.id DESC
